sentences.en: Ashurst said idly: " Where were you standing when you saw the gipsy bogle, Jim? "
sentences.cn: 艾舍斯特漫不经心地说: “ 你是站在什么地方看见吉普赛鬼的? ”

sentences.en: Black - eyed gipsy girls, hooded in showy handkerchiefs, sallied forth to tell fortunes.
sentences.cn: 黑眼睛的吉卜赛姑娘, 用华丽的手巾包着头, 突然地闯了进来替人算命.

sentences.en: Opposite a group of gipsy women were walking down the street.
sentences.cn: 马路对面有几个吉普赛女人在街上行走。

sentences.en: She had the kind of water - gipsy face , dusky but rosy.
sentences.cn: 她长着水上吉普赛人的脸孔, 黑里透红.

sentences.en: Soon, he was away in his new 16 - meter boat, Gipsy Moth.
sentences.cn: 不久, 他带着他的16米长的船, 吉普莫斯号上路了.

sentences.en: Soon, he was away in his new 16 - metre boat, Gipsy Moth.
sentences.cn: 不久, 他就驾着那艘16米长的新船吉普赛·莫思号启程出海了.

sentences.en: That old Gipsy woman tells fortunes.
sentences.cn: 那个吉卜赛老妇人替人算命.

sentences.en: The Gipsy offered to read my hand.
sentences.cn: 那个吉卜赛人提出要为我看手相.

sentences.en: The gipsy produced three tin cups, and filled them to the brim with brandy.
sentences.cn: 吉卜赛人取出三只锡杯, 斟满了白兰地.
吉普赛人坐着大篷车旅行.

sentences.en: To a newcomer the scene seemed an easy contrast between the country's haves and have-nots – but then the gipsy women climbed into the back seat of a brand new Mercedes.
sentences.cn: 新来者会把这样的景象看作是这个国家贫富之间的对照，但是这些吉普赛女人却坐进了一辆崭新奔驶轿车的后座。

trans.tran_cn: 吉普赛人，流浪汉，四海为家的人
